Car crashes into parked SUV in Biden's motorcade near Delaware campaign HQ  —  President Biden and first lady Jill Biden are safe after a car crashed into an SUV guarding his motorcade near his campaign headquarters in Wilmington, Delaware on Sunday night, the White House said.

Biden safe after car collides with motorcade  —  President Joe Biden was safe on Sunday night after a car collided with a motorcade SUV that was part of the president's security detail, a Reuters witness said.  —  Biden and First Lady Jill Biden had just left his campaign headquarters when the collision occurred.
